title: Pegasus
content:
I never uploaded samples of my type work on typophile before because I design hebrew type faces.

although hebrew might seem strange to your eyes, I would assume that meny aspects would be the same.

Here is a new type face i am working on, Sans serif design for streaming text.  
designed for brochurs, catalogues and such.
